name: Hack the Box (ChilledCosmonaut)
description: ’Hack The Box’ is an 3D Top-Down Turn-Based strategy game. It is influenced by well known titles like X-Com or Mario + Rabbids: Kingdom Battle. While having these titles in the back of the mind, there are some major changes to the overall gameplay. As the unique selling point, of being able to hack your enemies to join your side permanently, can not be found in any other games listed above.
